changeSet.author: sgf
sgf
sgf
changeSet.sql: UPDATE metadata.science_keyword set display = topic || CASE WHEN term IS NOT NULL THEN ' > ' || term ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN variable_level_1 IS NOT NULL THEN ' > ' || variable_level_1 ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN variable_level_2 IS NOT NULL THEN ' > ' || variable_level_2 ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN variable_level_3 IS NOT NULL THEN ' > ' || variable_level_3 ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN variable_level_4 IS NOT NULL THEN ' > ' || variable_level_4 ELSE '' END ;

changeSet.author: sgf
sgf
changeSet.sql: UPDATE metadata.science_keyword AS sk SET id = thetopic.id FROM (SELECT id, UPPER(name) AS uppername FROM metadata.topic) AS thetopic WHERE thetopic.uppername = sk.display;

INSERT INTO metadata.descriptive_metadata_science_keyword_xref (descriptive_metadata_id, science_keyword_id) ( SELECT txref.dataset_id, txref.topic_id FROM metadata.dataset_topic_xref txref JOIN metadata.topic ON txref.topic_id = topic.id WHERE taxonomy_id = '2');

changeSet.author: sgf
changeSet.createProcedure:
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION metadata.update_science_keyword_display() RETURNS trigger AS $BODY$ BEGIN NEW.display := INITCAP(NEW.topic || CASE WHEN NEW.term IS NOT NULL THEN ' > ' || NEW.term ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN NEW.variable_level_1 IS NOT NULL THEN ' > ' || NEW.variable_level_1 ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN NEW.variable_level_2 IS NOT NULL THEN ' > ' || NEW.variable_level_2 ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN NEW.variable_level_3 IS NOT NULL THEN ' > ' || NEW.variable_level_3 ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN NEW.variable_level_4 IS NOT NULL THEN ' > ' || NEW.variable_level_4 ELSE '' END) ;
RETURN NEW; END; $BODY$ LANGUAGE plpgsql VOLATILE COST 100;
changeSet.sql: ALTER FUNCTION metadata.update_science_keyword_display() OWNER TO esgcet_admin; GRANT EXECUTE ON FUNCTION metadata.update_science_keyword_display() TO esgcet_admin;
